Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e3.equipments.heater.mil

package fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e3.equipments.heater.mil

MIL models of the Heater component.

Licence

Copyright Jacques Malenfant, Sorbonne Universite.

Jacques.Malenfant@lip6.fr

This software is a computer program whose purpose is to implement a mock-up of household energy management system.

The fact that you are presently reading this means that you have had knowledge of the CeCILL-C license and that you accept its terms.

This package defines the MIL simulation models for the heater component in the Household Energy Management project.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e3.equipments.heater
    Thermostated Heater component for the Household Energy Management project.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e3.equipments.heater.mil.events
    MIL simulation events of the heater.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e3.equipments.heater.connections
     
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e3.equipments.heater.measures
    Measures and sensor data for the Heater component.
  • Class
    Description
    ExternalTemperatureModel
    The class ExternalTemperatureModel defines a simulation model for the environment, namely the external temperature of the house.
    HeaterCoupledModel
    The class HeaterCoupledModel defines a simple coupled model used to assemble the models defined for the heater in order to execute unit tests on the heater simulator.
    HeaterElectricityModel
    The class HeaterElectricityModel defines a simulation model for the electricity consumption of the heater.
    HeaterElectricityModel.HeaterElectricityReport
    The class HeaterElectricityReport implements the simulation report for the HeaterElectricityModel.
    HeaterOperationI
    The class HeaterOperationI defines the common operation used by events to execute on the heater models.
    HeaterStateModel
    The class HeaterStateModel is a simple model that tracks the current state of the heater as well as it receives events triggering state changes in the heater and reemits them towards the other heater models.
    HeaterStateModel.State
    The enumeration State defines the state in which the heater can be from the electric power consumption perspective.
    HeaterTemperatureModel
    The class HeaterTemperatureModel defines a simulation model for the temperature inside a room equipped with a heater.
    HeaterTemperatureModel.HeaterTemperatureReport
    The class HeaterTemperatureReport implements the simulation report for the HeaterTemperatureModel.
    HeaterUnitTesterModel
    The class HeaterUnitTesterModel defines a model that is used to test the models defining the heater simulator.
    MILSimulationArchitectures
    The class MILSimulationArchitectures defines the local MIL simulation architectures pertaining to the hair dryer components.
    RunHeaterUnitaryMILRTSimulation
    The class RunHairDryerUnitaryMILRTSimulation
    RunHeaterUnitaryMILSimulation
    The class RunHeaterUnitarySimulation creates a simulator for the heater and then runs a typical simulation.
